頟字的基本解释

頟
é
同“额”。

頟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［é］
［《廣韻》五陌切，入陌，疑。］
(1)见“頟頟”。
(2)同“額”。

頟字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頟； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1403第06
【唐韻】五陌切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】鄂格切，?同額。【說文】顙也。【揚子·方言】中夏謂之頟，東齊謂之顙。【六書故】髮下眉上謂頟。　又不休息貌。【書·益稷】罔晝夜頟頟。【傳】頟頟，肆惡無休息。【正韻】一曰推車聲。　又【釋名】頟，鄂也，有垠鄂也。　又地名。【史記·建元以來侯者表】龍頟侯韓說。【前漢·地理志】平原郡龍頟縣。【註】今書本頟字，或作額，而崔浩云：有龍頟村，作額者非。又叶逆各切，音咢。【卻正釋譏】人弔其躬，鬼芟其頟。初升高岡，終隕幽㕡。

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　頟; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1403 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Five Moss Cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Ege Cuts,? Same amount. 【Said Wen】Yi Ye. 【Yangtze Dialect】Zhong Xia is called Yun, and Eastern Qi is called Zhi. [Six Book Story] The hair on the eyebrows is said to be buzzard.　Doesn't take a break. 【Book·Yiji】Night day and night 頟頟. [Biography] Yun Yun, wantonly evil without rest. [Zheng Yun] One said the sound of carts.　 [Release name] Yun, E also, and Yin E.　Also place name. [Historical Records · Hou Zhe Table Since the Founding of Yuan Dynasty] Long Yun Hou Han said. [Former Han Geography] Longyun County, Pingyuan County. [Note] The word "頟" in today's book is also called "e", while Cui Haoyun: There is Longyun Village, and the "e" is not. Then Ye reversed each cut, the sound shook. [But Zheng Shixi] People hang their bows, and ghostly catch their winds. The first rises to the hill, the end falls quietly.
